com.seamless.ers.interfaces.external
Interface ERSWSExternalClientService

public interface ERSWSExternalClientService

External Client Service for third-party ERS clients.

Since:
2.0.0

Method Detail

requestTopup

ERSWSTopupResponse requestTopup(ClientContext context,
                                PrincipalId senderPrincipalId,
                                PrincipalId topupPrincipalId,
                                PrincipalAccountSpecifier senderAccountSpecifier,
                                PrincipalAccountSpecifier topupAccountSpecifier,
                                java.lang.String productId,
                                Amount amount)
Request a topup of a specified topup principal from a specified sender principal.

Parameters:
context - ClientContext for this request.
senderPrincipalId - The id of the principal that is to execute the topup (and be charged). If null the caller principal will be used (taken from the context)
topupPrincipalId - The id of the principal that is to receive the topup.
senderAccountSpecifier - Specifies the account of the sender to charge. Either specifies the specific account or which type of account to use.
topupAccountSpecifier - Specifies the account of the receiver to topup. Either specifies the specific account or which type of account to use.
productId - Id of the topup product. This is configurable in the ERS system.
amount - The amount to topup.
Returns:
ERSWSTopupResponse

requestTransfer

ERSWSTransferResponse requestTransfer(ClientContext context,
                                      PrincipalId senderPrincipalId,
                                      PrincipalId receiverPrincipalId,
                                      PrincipalAccountSpecifier senderAccountSpecifier,
                                      PrincipalAccountSpecifier receiverAccountSpecifier,
                                      java.lang.String productId,
                                      Amount amount)
Request a transfer between the specified principals.

Parameters:
context - ClientContext for this request.
senderPrincipalId - The id of the principal that is to send the funds. If null the caller principal will be used (taken from the context)
receiverPrincipalId - The id of the principal that is to receive the funds.
senderAccountSpecifier - Specifies the account of the sender to transfer from. Either specifies the specific account or which type of account to use.
receiverAccountSpecifier - Specifies the account of the receiver to transfer to. Either specifies the specific account or which type of account to use.
productId - Id of the product to use for this transfer. This is configurable in the ERS system.
amount - The amount to transfer.
Returns:
ERSWSTransferResponse

requestPrincipalInformation

ERSWSPrincipalInformationResponse requestPrincipalInformation(ClientContext context,
                                                              PrincipalId principalId)
Request information about the specified principal.

Parameters:
context - ClientContext for this request.
principalId - Principal ID of a principal for which the information is being requested.
Returns:
ERSWSPrincipalInformationResponse

changePrincipalPassword

ERSWSResponse changePrincipalPassword(ClientContext context,
                                      PrincipalId principalId,
                                      java.lang.String newPassword)
Change password for the specified principal. The new password will be sent to the principal.

Parameters:
context - ClientContext for this request.
principalId - Principal ID of a principal who's password should be changed.
newPassword - If specified, this will be the new password. If left null the ERS will generate a new password (the password will be reset).
Returns:
ERSWSResponse

requestPurchase

ERSWSPurchaseResponse requestPurchase(ClientContext context,
                                      PrincipalId senderPrincipalId,
                                      PrincipalId receiverPrincipalId,
                                      PrincipalAccountSpecifier senderAccountSpecifier,
                                      PrincipalAccountSpecifier receiverAccountSpecifier,
                                      java.util.List<PurchaseOrderRow> purchaseOrder)
Request a purchase (voucher) between the specified principals.

Parameters:
context - ClientContext for this request.
senderPrincipalId - The id of the principal that is to send the funds. If null the caller principal will be used (taken from the context)
receiverPrincipalId - The id of the principal that is to receive the funds.
senderAccountSpecifier - Specifies the account of the sender to transfer from. Either specifies the specific account or which type of account to use.
receiverAccountSpecifier - Specifies the account of the receiver to transfer to. Either specifies the specific account or which type of account to use.
purchaseOrder - List of PurchaseOrderRow
Returns:
ERSWSPurchaseResponse
Since:
2.1

sendInvoice

ERSWSSendInvoiceResponse sendInvoice(ClientContext context,
                                     Invoice invoice,
                                     java.util.List<CustomerToken> tokens)
Sends an invoice to ERS to be registered and possibly be paid later.

Parameters:
context - ClientContext for this request.
invoice - The invoice to be sent and registered, and possibly be paid later
tokens - The tokens that should be applied to purchase
Returns:
ERSWSSendInvoiceResponse
Since:
2.1

updateInvoice

ERSWSResponse updateInvoice(ClientContext context,
                            java.lang.String invoiceReference,
                            Invoice invoice,
                            java.util.List<CustomerToken> tokens)
Updates an already created invoice This is used in loyalty program scenarios when a discount is applied to an invoice after it is generated.

Parameters:
context - ClientContext for this request.
invoiceReference - Reference for this invoice.
invoice - The invoice to be sent and registered, and possibly be paid later
tokens - The tokens that has been resolved by merchant
Returns:
ERSWSResponse
Since:
2.1

getPaymentStatus

ERSWSPaymentStatusResponse getPaymentStatus(ClientContext context,
                                            java.lang.String invoiceReference,
                                            int invoiceVersion)
Retrieves the current status of the invoice, eg if it is paid or not

Parameters:
context - ClientContext for this request.
invoiceReference - reference of the invoice for this operation(Optional for physical shops)
invoiceVersion - version of the state that has been seen by the client, should contain the version that it received from last getPaymentStatus call, and zero on the first call
Returns:
ERSWSPaymentStatusResponse
Since:
2.1

cancelInvoice

ERSWSResponse cancelInvoice(ClientContext context,
                            java.lang.String invoiceReference)
Request canceling of an invoice, in case it is not already paid

Parameters:
context - ClientContext for this request.
invoiceReference - reference of the invoice for this operation.
Returns:
ERSWSResponse
Since:
2.1

confirmCustomerRegistration

ERSWSResponse confirmCustomerRegistration(ClientContext context,
                                          PrincipalId principalId,
                                          PrincipalId secondaryPrincipalId,
                                          java.lang.String registrationReference)
Approves the registration process of a specific principal eg this can be used to activate payment customers etc

Parameters:
context - ClientContext for this request.
principalId - Principal id of the principal that exists and is already trusted
secondaryPrincipalId - Principal id of the principal which is confirmed to be related to the person specified in principalId, eg the phone number belonging to a person
registrationReference - Optional reference given to the principal during the registration process
Returns:
ERSWSResponse
Since:
2.1

registerTerminal

ERSWSRegisterTerminalResponse registerTerminal(ClientContext context,
                                               java.lang.String externalTerminalId,
                                               java.lang.String password,
                                               java.lang.String name)
Registers a cashregister terminal

Parameters:
context - ClientContext for this request.
externalTerminalId - External reference for this cashregister, eg "store 1122/cashregister 7"
password - Password for future communications of this cashregister
name - Name of this cashregister as it appears when paying, eg "ICA - cashregister 3"
Returns:
ERSWSResponse
Since:
2.1

unregisterTerminal

ERSWSResponse unregisterTerminal(ClientContext context)
Unregisters a terminal

Parameters:
context - ClientContext for this request.
Returns:
ERSWSResponse
Since:
2.1

assignSeqrId

ERSWSResponse assignSeqrId(ClientContext context,
                           java.lang.String seqrId)
Assigns the specified SEQR ID to the cashregister

Parameters:
context - ClientContext for this request.
seqrId - SEQR ID to be assigned to this cashregister
Returns:
ERSWSResponse
Since:
2.1

submitPaymentReceipt

ERSWSResponse submitPaymentReceipt(ClientContext context,
                                   java.lang.String ersReference,
                                   ReceiptDocument receiptDocument)
Submits a receipt document for a previously completed payment. The recommended and only supported format right now is ARTS XML digital receipt format.

Parameters:
context - The client context
ersReference - The ERS reference for the payment
receiptDocument - The receipt document, preferably in ARTs Receipt XML format
Returns:
ERSWSResponse
Since:
2.2.0

refundPayment

ERSWSResponse refundPayment(ClientContext context,
                            java.lang.String ersReference,
                            Invoice invoice)
Refunds a payment, partially or completely

Parameters:
context - The client context
ersReference - The ERS reference for the payment
invoice - The invoice that contains the details of the refund
Returns:
ERSWSResponse
Since:
2.2.0

markTransactionPeriod

ERSWSMarkTransactionPeriodResponse markTransactionPeriod(ClientContext context,
                                                         ParameterMap parameters)
Marks an end / a beginning of a transaction period, to be used in reporting.

Parameters:
context - The client context
parameters - Optional parameters that can be used in processing this request
Returns:
ERSWSMarkTransactionPeriodResponse
Since:
2.2.0

executeReport

ERSWSExecuteReportResponse executeReport(ClientContext context,
                                         java.lang.String reportId,
                                         java.lang.String language,
                                         ParameterMap parameters)
Executes a report on the ERS.

Parameters:
context - The client context
reportId - The identifier of the report that should be executed
language - The language in which the report should be provided or null if the default language should be used
parameters - Optional parameters that can be used in processing this request
Returns:
ERSWSExecuteReportResponse
Since:
2.2.0

ERSWSResponse commitReservation(ClientContext context,
                                java.lang.String invoiceReference)
Commits a reserved amount.

Parameters:
context -
invoiceReference -
Returns:
ERSWSResponse
Since:
2.3.0

benchmarkingNop

ERSWSResponse benchmarkingNop()
No-operation method that is used for benchmarking purposes.

Returns:
A successful ERSWSResponse
